items.sentence: I heard part of Tom and Mary\'s conversation.
I\'ll introduce you to Tom if you want me to.
I\'m not as good at playing tennis as Tom is.
I\'m not planning to meet Tom at the airport.
Tom closed his eyes and drifted off to sleep.
Tom killed himself on his thirtieth birthday.
Do you think Tom would be willing to help us?
Do you think Tom would care if Mary did that?
Do you think Tom would mind if Mary did that?
Does Tom know you want to buy a new computer?
Tom leaned over and kissed Mary on the cheek.
Why would anybody think that was a good idea?
Mary didn\'t want Tom to find out about John.
Do you think that Tom is planning to help us?
Tom asked me if I was happy and I said I was.
Tom asked me if anybody was in the classroom.
Tom asked me if he could go home early today.
Tom asked me to bring my own eating utensils.
You ought to tell Tom that Mary will do that.
Tom learned how to play the guitar in Boston.
